legals.legal_copy:
Entertainment Starter TV Pack.

Prices and content may change at any time during the contract. Separate contracts apply to BT Broadband, BT TV and BT Sport.

BT TV 18 month minimum term. £4.00 a month. Currently £4.50 a month from month 19. You'll need BT Broadband. Existing broadband customers must have 18 months remaining on your contract, if not, you'll need to re‐contract your broadband. Availability of digital channels and quality of content depends on local transmitter and suitable rooftop aerial (www.freeview.co.uk/availability). £20 charge for broadband extenders, if necessary. HDMI connection required. Payment by direct debit. Minimum line speed required to watch the live AMC channel and BT Sport. A 10m cable will be provided.

Loyalty Discount ‐ Save £9 over 18 months compared to the standard monthly price.
